creator: jvr@nykredit.dk
text:
pvcs task does not delete temp files properly.
Probably because the file is locked when a delete is attempted.
Could you please provide more details?
creator: conor@apache.org

text:
My understanding is that this was fixed for 1.5 by bodewig in Revision 1.14.2.1
of Jun 12, 2002.  Unless someone has details on a different temp file still left
lying around, we can close this.
creator: snewton@io.com

text: Great - I'm closing as FIXED - Thanks Steven
creator: conor@apache.org
